comments:
Build: F3
1. Create a plug-in project (com.example.xyz (1.0.0))
2. Try to create a fragment:
   i. On the last page of the New Fragment wizard, browse and select 
com.example.xyz.  The plug-in id and version are now filled with the correct 
values.
   ii. Delele all characters in the plug-in version field.  The 'Finish' button 
is surprisingly enabled.
   iii. Click 'Finish'.  As a result, you will get the following Assertion 
failed error message:

org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.AssertionFailedException: assertion failed: A 
plug-in version identifier must be non-empty.

(PluginVersionIdentifier.java:151)
